name: AVAudio3DAngularOrientation
desc: A structure that represents the angular orientation of the listener in 3D space.

items.name: init(yaw: Float, pitch: Float, roll: Float)
items.desc: Creates a 3D angular orientation using the yaw, pitch, and roll values you specify.

items.name: func AVAudioMake3DAngularOrientation(Float, Float, Float) -> AVAudio3DAngularOrientation
items.desc: Creates a 3D angular orientation using the yaw, pitch, and roll values you specify.

items.name: var yaw: Float
items.desc: The side-to-side movement of the listener’s head.

items.name: var pitch: Float
items.desc: The up-and-down movement of the listener’s head.

items.name: var roll: Float
items.desc: The tilt of the listener’s head.
